id="I_2vDoIHD65nUIwoVSAJ-32" value="<div style="text-align: center; box-sizing: border-box; width: 100%; background: rgb(228, 228, 228); padding: 2px;"><b><font color="#000000">user_account(유저 div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 362px; height: 380px; padding-top: 0px; margin-left: 0px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; width: 360px; height: 380px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; width: 100%; height: 100%; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
text-align: center; box-sizing: border-box; width: 100%; background: rgb(228, 228, 228); padding: 2px;

tr.td:
title(제목) - varchar(255)
content(본문) - varchar(65535)
hashtag(해시태그) - varchar(255)
createdAt(생성일시) - datetime
createdBy(생성자) - varchar(100)
modifiedAt(수정일시) - datetime
modifiedBy(수정자) - varchar(100)
